description:
Periodic task _sync_power_states  shutes instances down when the instance was rebooted from wthin itself. This happens when sync_power_states checks this instance and this instance is just rebooting for some reason (issued by scripts or users from within then instance).  Hypervisor is libvirt/XEN. 
In libvirt/XEN the instance has status PAUSED for a short time when it it is rebooted from within. _sync_power_states shutes every machine down wich is in PAUSED state. So we should wait for a short time an recheck if machine is still in PAUSED-state before shuting it down .
title: _sync_power_states shutes instances down when rebooted from within instance

comments.content:
Are you sure of the instance power state PAUSED when the shut down by _sync_power_states happens?

Looking at the code, instances with power state PAUSED are ignored:

https://github.com/openstack/nova/blob/625d593/nova/compute/manager.py#L4044

however instances with power state SUSPENDED are shut down.
